input.sentences: i went to a warehouse over a weekend with a friend who was designing shirts for domestic abuse .
this shirt spoke volumes and had me moved .
this shirt was one of the saddest shirts that i have ever seen . it was an horrific story .
this shirt talked to me . true love is not about control .
i read a headline on one of the shirts about a student that died in a dispute . it was sad .
output.sentences: A sign stands explaining there is t shirt decorating ahead
A t-shirt shares a message about domestic violence
Another t-shirt shares a message about domestic violence and drinking
A different t-shirt says "true love is not control"
A newspaper heading talks about domestic violence
